.. change::
    :tags: bug, mysql
    :tickets: 12964

    Resolved MySQL 8 ``FOR SHARE`` compilation so that
    :meth:`_sql.Select.with_for_update` emits ``FOR SHARE`` (with ``OF``,
    ``NOWAIT`` and ``SKIP LOCKED`` modifiers) when supported, while maintaining
    ``LOCK IN SHARE MODE`` for older MySQL versions.
